doc:
Brigitte Lahaie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brigitte_Lahaie 0 Brigitte Vanmeerhaeghe, known as Brigitte Lahaie (born 12 October 1955) is a French radio talk show host, mainstream film actress and former pornographic actress. She performed in erotic films from 1976 through 1980 and is a member of the XRCO Hall of Fame. Brigitte_Vanmeerhaeghe , known as Brigitte_Lahaie ( born 12_October_1955 ) is a_French_radio_talk_show_host , mainstream_film_actress and former_pornographic_actress . She performed in erotic_films from 1976 through 1980 and is a_member of the_XRCO_Hall of Fame .
